name: Cashier
tagline: Cashier.tk, is a cloud Saas software system. Built to deliver a stable experience for large retail operations, as well as storefronts anywhere in the globe.
description:
Cashier.tk, is a cloud Saas software system. Built to deliver a stable experience for large retail operations, as well as storefronts anywhere in the globe.

The payment processing via Stellar Network presents a chance to be a benefit to many communities where cryptocurrency is a new asset.

Cashier.tk is able to also maintain inventory and manage a team role based authentication system. Planned improvements include a Customer Data Profile on an account basis with Google Analytics and Performance Reporting as well as language localization.

name: Swinvoice
tagline: Swinvoice is an invoicing Application that makes it easy for Users to send invoice and receive payment , payment includes Mobius Mobi, Stellar XLM and Credit/Debit Card charge , the System also supports a p2p and all payment are escrow to prevent fraudulent activities
description: Swinvoice is an invoicing Application that makes it easy for Users to send invoice and receive payment , payment includes Mobius Mobi, Stellar XLM and Credit/Debit Card charge , the System also supports a p2p and all payment are escrow to prevent fraudulent activities

name: TextOffDApps
tagline: TextOffDApps is a short message service that will let you send messages from the Mobius Dapps Store to any mobile phone worldwide, it is cheap and easy to use
description: TextOffDApps is a short message service that will let you send messages from the Mobius Dapps Store to any mobile phone worldwide, it is cheap and easy to use

name: Winsome
tagline: Gift Giving and Digital Marketing Platform
description: Give or receive gifts for fun or for profit. Get rewarded for learning.

name: Task OffDApps
tagline: A task rewarding DApps with an Escrow system
description: A task rewarding DApps with an Escrow system that lets you conduct a p2p insured with escrow.

name: Survey Rewards
description:
Create surveys and reward those who complete surveys with MOBI tokens. This operates something like Google Opinion Rewards but for the Mobius store.

A base fee of 10 MOBI is charged to create a survey. In addition 1 MOBI per completed survey must be provisioned to reward participants. On survey create you can specify how many survey completions you would like to target. So for example if you want 100 users to complete your survey then the cost of survey creation will be 100 MOBI (to be payed to 100 users as reward) plus 10 MOBI base fee for a total of 110 MOBI.

The 10 MOBI base fee is collected by the DApp and will be later exchanged for STEM tokens and donated to STEMchain approved projects.

name: Flappy Bird
tagline: The most famous bird on the blockchain
description: Proof-of-concept clone of the famous Flappy Bird game. You will be charged 0.0001MOBI for each play.

name: Pixo Guess
tagline: With 15 picture per round and 10 seconds each, guess correctly who you see in the pictures
description: With 15 picture per round and 10 seconds each, guess correctly who you see in the pictures. charges : 20mobi , 50 mobi, 100 mobi with a x2 return if you complete the round

name: Mogo Pick
tagline: A simple Raffle ticket game, a random ticket is selected at the end of the week
description: A simple Raffle ticket game, a random ticket is selected at the end of the week and the winner takes home 80% of total waged. Ticket: 100 MOBI.

name: 8matches
description: 8matches is a football predicting service, with 500MOBI you can buy a daily ticket with properly predicted football matches you can wager on

name: Stellarball
tagline: Stellar Based Lotto - deposit MOBI and then wager in the game!
description:
Stellarball is a lottery game that allows player to pick 6 numbers between 1-99 and make payment with Stellar Lumens and Mobius 1 Ticket = 100mobi.

Ticket with at least 2 winning number in the daily draw 12AM GMT+1 is entitled to the pot wining of the day.
